dt: {bc}a schematic arrangement of the inflectional forms of a verb
{bc}a class of verbs having the same type of inflectional forms
{bc}a set of the simple or derivative inflectional forms of a verb especially in Sanskrit or the Semitic languages
{bc}fusion of usually similar gametes with ultimate union of their nuclei and sexual reproduction that occurs in most fungi and in some algae (such as green algae)
{bc}temporary cytoplasmic union with exchange of nuclear material that is the usual sexual process in ciliated protozoans
{bc}the one-way transfer of DNA between bacteria in cellular contact

shortdef: a schematic arrangement of the inflectional forms of a verb
a class of verbs having the same type of inflectional forms
